properties.name: Ghohroud, Qamsar, Kashan County, Isfahan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Ghohroud, Qamsar, Kashan County, Isfahan Province, Iran

Location: Iran

Ghohroud is a village near Kashan and 150 km away from Isfahan. Mineralogy of the Ghohroud metamorphic rocks (http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2010EGUGA..12.1606A).

View on Mindat.org

properties.name: Corundum-bearing pegmatite, Alvand Mountains, Hamadan Province, Iran
properties.description:
Corundum-bearing pegmatite, Alvand Mountains, Hamadan Province, Iran

Type: 309

Location: Iran

A N20E trending pegmatite dyke, about 80 m long and 1-2 m thick is intruded the contact metamorphic rocks (andalusite, garnet and cordierite-bearing hornfels) and the Alvand granitoid, at south of Hamedan. Corundum-bearing pegmatite (CBP) dyke conta...
